# Pixel_16F | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Accelerate ](/documentation/accelerate)

- [ Pixel_16F ](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_16f)

-  Pixel_16F 

Type Alias# Pixel_16F

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
typealias Pixel_16F = UInt16
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_16f#discussion)

A 16-bit half precision floating-point planar pixel value.

Typically, these have range [0,1] though other values are generally allowed. Defined as a 16-bit integer since this is a storage format only.

## [See Also](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_16f#see-also)

### [Pixel Formats](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_16f#Pixel-Formats)

[`typealias Pixel_8`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_8)A type for a planar, 8-bits-per-channel, unsigned pixel.[`typealias Pixel_88`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_88)A type for a two-channel, 8-bits-per-channel, unsigned pixel.[`typealias Pixel_8888`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_8888)A type for a four-channel, 8-bits-per-channel, unsigned pixel.[`typealias Pixel_F`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_f)A type for a planar, 32-bits-per-channel, floating-point pixel.[`typealias Pixel_FFFF`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_ffff)A type for a four-channel, 32-bits-per-channel, floating-point pixel.[`typealias Pixel_32U`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_32u)A type you use for the XRGB2101010 format.[`typealias Pixel_16U`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_16u)A type for a planar, 16-bits-per-channel, unsigned pixel.[`typealias Pixel_ARGB_16U`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_argb_16u)A type for a four-channel, 16-bits-per-channel, unsigned pixel.[`typealias Pixel_16U16U`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_16u16u)A type for a two-channel, 16-bits-per-channel, unsigned pixel.[`typealias Pixel_16Q12`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_16q12)A type for a signed 16-bit, fixed-point number with 12 bits of fractional precision.[`typealias Pixel_16S`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_16s)A type for a planar, 16-bits-per-channel, signed pixel.[`typealias Pixel_ARGB_16S`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_argb_16s)A type for a four-channel, 16-bits-per-channel, signed pixel.[`typealias Pixel_16F16F`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_16f16f)[`typealias Pixel_16S16S`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_16s16s)[`typealias Pixel_ARGB_16F`](/documentation/accelerate/pixel_argb_16f)
